divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 510 AM. I was taking my dog out and happened to notice a bright light tothe South. It was still dark out at this time and the skies were totallyclear.At first I thought it was a plane but as it moved accross the sky I didntnotice any blinking lights common to aircraft. Also there are no flight paths inthat route. I know this because I watch the sky constantly. There was noapparent noise I could hear. It was some distance from me so that may be why. Idecided to get my Sony mini-cam and record some of it. To my astonishment when Izoomed in on the object I saw three bright white lights in a triangle formation.I taped tbe object for about thirty seconds before my battery went dead. Iwatched it disapear over some rooftops. After watching the tape a dozen times Iswear I can see the faint outline of a triangle.I need help getting thisconverted to digital format so it can be examined more thorough.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hanover Park
There were no other sightings in Hanover Park on or around November 13th 2003
